DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Stress Free Now : Internet-based Mindfulness Program Stress Management
DOC.detailed_description: Chronic , severe stress , risk factor premature age myocardial infarction , affect 35 % North Americans . Stress management program , effective , may prohibitively resource intensive difficult access broad population . This research examine whether online stress management program - Stress Free NowÂ© ( SFN ) - achieve meaningful improvement measure stress wellbeing . We also examine whether improvement wellbeing stress enhance online , internet base support group share experience go Stress Free Now program . This program model intensive group program , call Mindfulness Based Stress Reduction ( MBSR ) , show benefit across broad array medical issue addition specific stress relate problem . This three arm randomize control trial last 12 week . Participants randomize one study arm : Non intervention Control , Stress Free Now Stress Free Now + Message Board . We aim enrol 600 participant , expectation 50 % complete study ( 100 per group ) . A series questionnaires collect baseline , end 8-week program follow week 12 . Outcome measure stress , mindfulness , vitality , physical , social emotional health , transcendence self-acceptance . We also ask participant complete weekly log measure program adherence usage .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old Signup SFN ( one intervention group ) Agree participate research Have regular access internet
